apps.description: Swelly keeps their survey/feedback exchange as simple as possible with a standardized image based ‘this or that’ format, which is called a ‘Swell’. Both brands and users can create Swells and post them publicly, or to specific targets, in order to crowdsource opinions. With Kin, users can crowdsource quicker by featuring their Swells with a Kin reward that's given to users who engage with the Swell. User can also gift others for high quality swells and can use their Kin to purchase a 5 euro coupon for a leading retail brand.
apps.title: Swelly provides a platform for Gen Z and millennials to crowdsource opinions for their daily decision making.
apps.name: Swelly

apps.description: Carlyle the Cat is back for the holidays and this time he is more crazy than ever! He has stolen the candy to take back to his horde. Your mission is to dodge the subway obstacles and jump, roll, duck, dive, shoot and fly your way to a new all-time high score! Earn Kin by finding Gold Keys and spend Kin to extend your game.
apps.title: Subway Scooter Surf
apps.name: Subway Scooter Surf

apps.description:
It’s the 60s, a time of art, love, and sneaks.

The Man With No Color enlists Catpurse, the world’s greatest cat burglar, to steal the most valuable pop art in the country.

They work their way up to the creme de la creme of art: a one of a kind art piece by none other than Andy Walrus, the pope of pop art himself. No one knows what it is yet.

Catpurse must steal it at its unveiling, right under everyone’s noses. The press will be electric. The security stifling.

Can Catpurse get to it? Can he avoid capture and take home the prize piece, whatever it is? Most of all, can he trust this mysterious Man With No Color?
apps.title: Catpurse in: "Pop Art Peril!"
apps.name: Catpurse in: "Pop Art Peril!"

Tippic is a new way to discover amazing photos and reward the people who create them!

        With Tippic, you get to enjoy carefully curated beautiful photos from amateur photographers around the world. But, that’s not all. Instead of just giving them another heart or thumbs up, you get the chance to actually reward them for their work, using Kin, a new digital currency created to give everyone the chance to get rewarded for the value they create online.
apps.title: Discover a new photo every day.
apps.name: Tippic
